:rows.description: Set the row count of the paragraph placeholder
:rows.description_zh: 设置段落占位图的行数

:width.description: Set the width of the paragraph placeholder. If it's an array, it's the width of each line; otherwise, it's the width of the last line
:width.description_zh: 设置段落占位图的宽度，若为数组时则为对应的每行宽度，反之则是最后一行的宽度

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className
